attributes.action: Ask his Media Team to stop rejecting petitions just because the sound simillar to a different one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have logged 16 petitions on ths site and not one has been approved.. All are simillar to another one.. This may be the case but the other ones didnt say what i wanted them to say when i wanted to say them. We urge the PM to instruct his online Media Team to stop being so Draconian in its application of the "That sounds Simillar" Policy.. after all if you describe the shape of an organe and a shape of an apple they sound the same but no one would agree they are

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
